Name: Arano Restoration
Details: Among the groups that oppose Santiago Espinosa's absolute rule over the Aurigan worlds, one is known as the 'Arano Restoration' and fights for the day the liberties of the Aurigan Coalition will be restored under the rule of House Arano. Called by Lady Kamea Arano as her 'sword of restoration', it is composed of former members of her house guard as well as volunteers from all over the Reach.
